title: EastEnders spoilers: Honey destroys Adam over his affair?
text:
Honey Mitchell (Emma Barton) is a broken woman as she tries to get her head around the betrayal of her cheating partner Adam Bateman (Stephen Rahman-Hughes). Adam had been conducting an affair with Habiba Ahmed (Rukku Nahar), something which Honey soon became aware of.

Her lack of confidence in herself and her fear of being alone left Honey feeling distraught at the prospect of confronting him so she has painted a smile on and continued with the sham of a relationship, even with Habiba herself pointing out that she deserves much better than him

Along with her sister Iqra (Pruya Davdra), Habiba has become wise to Adam’s true nature as it has emerged that this isn’t the first time the selfish womaniser has cheated. In upcoming scenes, Honey will be plagued by thoughts over what to do for the best as she agonises over her broken heart.

With her marriage to Billy (Perry Fenwick) having broken down because of cheating, she will continue to wonder if it’s something to do with her that she gets treated this way and recently, viewers have become worried about her state of mind and have predicted that she is secretly suffering from an eating disorder.

Adam is oblivious to the fact that his secret is out and he continues to try and stay on Honey’s side. As she comes to a decision, Adam surprises her with the suggestion of a family holiday – but how will she respond?

Will she finally confront him over what he has done or will she try and convince herself that he can change and his heart is hers alone?

It’s clear that a happy ending isn’t on the horizon for this couple as Adam is due to leave Walford in an upcoming storyline but it remains to be seen whether Honey stands up to him and exposes him as the love rat that he is.

EastEnders airs these scenes on Friday 1st November at 8pm on BBC One.
